overview:
Mr. Matson brings a broad range of business development, marketing and sales expertise to ZuluTime’s Business Development role. Most recently, he led business development for a software startup, RNA Networks, and established a strong partner program of industry leaders and resellers, including HP and Mellanox.

With over 20 years at Intel Corporation, Mr. Matson ran marketing organizations in enterprise and desktop areas, led strategic planning for Intel’s software organization with a focus on mobility, and spent 5 years in field sales for the company. He has a BS in Electrical Engineering and MSIA (MBA) from Purdue University.
